name: BioticFlux
description: The quantum heart of the ecosystem. Sun and moon cycle through wheat and mushroom growth, while matter flows through detritus and death.

name: CyberDebtMegacity
description: A sprawling cyberpunk megacity where debt fuels the neon lights and criminal syndicates rule from towering spires. Spaceships dock in skyports amid a haze of digital crime and endless obligations. Everyone owes someone. The pulse of arriving rockets marks the rhythm of commerce; the chains of debt mark everything else.

driver.comment: Ships arrive in irregular pulses, driving commerce

gated_lindblad_source.comment: Debt leads to death when chains tighten
Debt accumulates faster when ships don't come
Keys unlock wealth when spies find secrets
Wealth bleeds to debt when trade slows

name: EchoingChasm
description: A labyrinth of resonant canyons where forgotten songs unravel reality. Faint bells toll in the wind, webs of memory trap the unwary, and identities fade into silent graves under a perpetual twilight. The acoustics here amplify dissolutionâ€”what the Chorus sings, the walls remember and repeat until meaning erodes.

driver.comment: Waves of silence that amplify dissolution

gated_lindblad_source.comment: Songs dissolve identity when silence ebbs

name: FungalNetworks
description: Networked fungal colonies thrive in moonlight and moisture, spreading through insects and spores, cycling between health and death.

name: HorizonFracture
description: Fractured rifts at the world's edge, where planets dissolve into swirling voids. Boundaries blur between something and nothing, with fleeting stars guiding nomads through probabilistic paths amid decaying horizons. The Cartographers chart what they can; the Black Horizon claims the rest.

driver.comment: Shooting stars pulse irregularly, guiding navigation

gated_lindblad_source.comment: Vortices feed the void when darkness is high
Void expands when stars don't guide
Telescopes find markers when stars pulse

name: StarterForest
description: A quiet forest edge where celestial cycles drive life. Sun and moon oscillate above while creatures and plants dance between survival and growth.

name: StellarForges
description: Industrial space. Energy cycles through power and storage while production shifts between active fabrication and raw materials, outputting rockets and saucers.

name: Village
description: A farming settlement where fire and ice oscillate in hearths, labor produces bread, and gears grind flour into commerce.

name: VolcanicWorlds
description: Extreme geology. Fire forges stone into crystal while mining and steam shape the environment into glowing vitality.

name: TidalPools
description: A liminal shore where cosmic tides expose and submerge quantum states in eternal rhythm. The spiral pools are natural measurement apparatusesâ€”when the moon floods them, coherence spreads; when it drains, probability collapses and the stranded reveal their fates. The environment doesn't choose sides. It simply processes.

name: BureaucraticAbyss
description: The machine that processes billions. Not evilâ€”evil requires intention. Simply thorough. Edicts descend from the Gilded Rot above, pass through endless functionaries, and eventually produce outcomes: transfers, terminations, deaths. The archives grow. The graves fill. The signatures never stop.

name: GildedRot
description: The eternal party above the grinding machine. Wine flows, masks smile, roses bloom in impossible colors. The aristocracy has danced here for so long they've forgotten there's a belowâ€”or perhaps they remember perfectly and find it amusing. Blood-tribute rises through hidden channels, transformed into vintage. Edicts descend like party favors, each one a death sentence wrapped in calligraphy.

name: _orphan_lindblads
description: Collected Lindblad terms for emojis not found in any biome

name: BroadcastTower
description: A crackling relay station at the edge of coherence. Signals propagate through antenna arrays, degrade into static, fragment into noise. The tower hums with transmissions that may or may not reach their destinations. What cannot be heard is eventually forgotten.

name: SatelliteGraveyard
description: Orbital debris field where dead satellites tumble in eternal silence among dying stars. Recorded data corrupts slowly in the radiation bath. Nothing is recovered hereâ€”only preserved in degraded form, waiting for the void to claim it.

name: Clinic
description: Sterile light hums above examination tables. Treatments expire on shelves. Diagnosis leads inexorably to prohibition or intervention. The genetics persist long after the patient is goneâ€”the only true record of what was attempted here.

name: Workshop
description: The honest entropy of labor. Hammers ring in steady rhythm. Tools wear down with use, are repaired, wear down again. Everything here serves a purpose until it doesn't, then joins the cycle of salvage and reuse.

name: ScrapYard
description: The terminal basin. Everything ends here eventuallyâ€”machinery, materials, workers. The ğŸ—‘ grows ever larger. But from decay comes recycling, and from recycling, raw material flows back into the world. Even endings feed beginnings.

name: MarketDistrict
description: Hub of commerce where goods become money and money becomes obligation. Bulls and bears pace the trading floors while businessmen cut deals in shadowed alcoves. Everything has a price tag. Everything flows toward or away from wealth.

gated_lindblad_source.comment: Bulls drive profits when goods flow
Bears cause losses when goods stop

name: TradingFloor
description: Pure speculation distilled. Bulls charge, bears retreat, charts rise and crash. Yesterday's analysis is worthless today. The floor is a fever dream of numbers that mean everything and nothing.

name: WeaversLoft
description: Threads fray under patient fingers. Garments take shape, wear out, return to thread. Needles pierce and bind. Knots holdâ€”until they don't. The loft smells of lanolin and old cloth, and nothing here is ever truly finished.

name: BindingCircle
description: A small sacred space where oaths are knotted into permanence. Prayer beads count the bindings. Candles witness the promises. What is tied here does not easily come undoneâ€”but nothing lasts forever, not even vows.

name: MeditationGarden
description: Lantern light flickers over still water. Breathing slows. The attempt to hold coherence against the constant pull of dissolution. Enlightenment is an attractor stateâ€”difficult to reach, stable once achieved, but the lights always fade eventually.

decay.comment: Enlightenment is stable but not permanent

name: OccultSanctum
description: Warding magic hums in the shadows. The evil eye watches from every corner, deflecting what should not enter. Candles and lanterns mark the protective boundaries. The ashes of guardian spirits rest in urns along the walls.

name: ShrineOfAshes
description: Where the cremated rest. Final rites are performed by candlelight, prayers strung on beads that outlast the prayers themselves. The dead flow in; only memory flows out. A quiet terminus for those who burned.

name: PastoralCommons
description: Flocks graze on common land. Bees drift between wildflowers. Porridge simmers over low fires while gentle hands shape the future. A peaceful placeâ€”but peace is fragile, and predators are always circling.

name: Apiary
description: Hives hum with focused industry. Honey accumulates in jars, beginning its slow transformation. The bees know their work; the keepers know theirs. A small, sweet place where fermentation begins.

name: Harbor
description: Salt air and creaking rope. Vessels rest at anchor while rust accumulates on hooks and chains. Ice melts in bilgewater. The harbor is a pause between voyagesâ€”a place where things wait, and waiting has its own entropy.

name: FreshwaterSpring
description: Source water wells up from deep stone. Ice melts at the margins. Bubbles rise and pop in an instant. This is where water begins its journey through the worldâ€”fundamental, flowing, feeding everything downstream.

name: Battlefield
description: Steel meets steel in thunder and blood. Shields splinter. Explosions tear the air. The dead pile up, awaiting the ash-brothers who will give them proper ending. This is where violence concentrates, fast and hot and hungry.

name: RevolutionSquare
description: Fists raised against the sky. Flags snap in the wind. Manifestos are shouted to crowds who may or may not be listening. Movements coalesce here, burn bright, and fragment. The bureaucrats watch from distant windows.

name: OrbitalStrike
description: Space warfare at its most brutal. Warships hunt cargo vessels among the stars. Explosions bloom in vacuum silence. What the ğŸ›¸ destroy, the ğŸš€ cannot deliver. The distant stars bear witness to commerce interrupted by fire.

name: Archives
description: Records accumulate in endless stacks. Filing systems slowly fail. Precedent decays into ambiguity. The scales of justice gather dust. Here, knowledge persists imperfectlyâ€”better than memory, worse than truth.

name: AbandonedQuarter
description: What remains when power withdraws. Crumbling monuments to forgotten purposes. Empty urns that once held meaning. Stone slowly claims what was built upon it. Time moves differently hereâ€”geological, patient, absolute.

name: ForgottenCastle
description: The party ended centuries ago. Edicts yellow on the walls. Eagles circle the towers, waiting for scraps that no longer come. Roses have wilted into memory. What was once the seat of power is now a monument to its absence.

name: DemolitionSite
description: Controlled destruction. Dynamite cracks. Flames consume. Bricks scatter. What took years to build comes down in moments. A necessary violence that clears the way for what comes next.

name: Woodlot
description: Timber country. Axes ring against trunks. Trees become lumber become firewood become ash. The forest gives and the forest takes, and the cycle turns with every swing of the blade.

name: MirrorChamber
description: A space of reflectionâ€”literal and otherwise. Candlelight flickers across silvered glass. Shadows gather in corners. The self observes the self observing. Identity becomes uncertain here, and what looks back may not be what looks in.

name: TrappersCamp
description: Where hunters wait. Snares are set in careful patterns. Hooks bait the unwary. Rabbits wander in; bones remain. A patient, predatory place where capture is the craft and remains are the record.

gated_lindblad_source.comment: Traps kill when prey is present

name: EnforcementPost
description: Law's presence, however temporary. Patrol cars wait. Keys jingle on belts that may unlock or bind. Chains rattle in holding cells. Clipboards track the processed. Authority asserts itself hereâ€”until the shift ends.

name: PowerStation
description: The grid's heart. Electricity hums through transformers. Batteries charge and discharge. Gears turn generators. Connections fail and are repaired in endless cycles. The Kilowatt Collective keeps the lights onâ€”usually.

name: MagneticAnomaly
description: Something wrong with the local physics. Compasses spin. Instruments give impossible readings. Vortices form in electromagnetic fields. Signals bend around the anomaly's heart. A small, strange place where the rules are merely suggestions.

name: AntimatterFoundry
description: Where annihilation is harvested. Void-stuff and starlight collide in magnetic containment. The energy released is beyond measureâ€”and so is the danger. When containment fails, the void claims its due. This is where the Black Horizon's physics are put to work.
